Either way its still overwatch, sure the first game was way better and the story campaign was a let down. But if you sit there and give it a thumbs down all because your butt hurt is pathetic.
Son of a bitch, fxxking Blizzard, you updated a piece of shit. If I were you, I would post a video kowtowing to all players. GO TO FXXKING HELL.

72 hours on record from using the Battle.net launcher at time of writing.
Beware, the majority of things promised are not actually in-game unless they're cosmetic/battlepass related.
Balance changes are usually abysmal and catered towards the dying competitive scene, so unless you have friends you can goof around with or you want to tryhard, there is absolutely nothing for you here.
The game also employs every mobile game tactic under the sun to get you to come back and spend money on the battlepass, because at the end of the day, that's the only thing that seems to matter to Blizzard. Even if you don't pay, the battlepass itself is quite the grind too, especially if you want all the rewards.

I'll play it again only with friends. Just watch the PvE mission on youtube, you'll not be missing out on anything.
this shit makes me miss LOOTBOXES

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
